sample_landsat_data: Landsat Collection 2 Analysis Ready Data were downloaded from USGS Earth Explorer
(https://earthexplorer.usgs.gov/). Sample data used in package 'gdalraster' were
reprojected to NAD83 / UTM 12N (EPSG:26912) and clipped to the following extent in
UTM 12N coordinates (min X, min Y, max X, max Y):
File names for surface reflectance used in 'gdalraster' are sr_b#_20200829.tif.
Metadata for the original source are given below.
